name: Sega Ages Vol. 11: Phantasy Star Collection
storyline: The plot of the original series focuses around the heroic exploits of the residents of the Algol planetary system as they defend their worlds from the agent of the Profound Darkness, Dark Falz. The main planets the heroes in each game visit in Algol include Palma, Motavia, and Dezoris.
summary: Relive the series that revolutionized RPG gaming! Explore the vast Algo Solar System and do battle with an arsenal of weapons, magical spells, and armor. Defeat the evil King Lassic to restore peace to the galaxy! Uncover the shocking secrets of the Motavian society! Live through three generations to conquer monstrous mutations!
